name: Magic Revenge: Raid Legends
description:
The best Idle Strategy RPG game! Collect and upgrade your heroes, battle with your friends!
Join millions of players around the world and start your journey in Magic Revenge：Raid Legends!

GAME FEATURES

1. Best IDLE System
Your heroes will fight automatically even if you’re away. In this way, you can get massive equipment and gems easily, and have a casual game experience.

2. Evolving Strategy (Summon & Evolution)
Hundreds of heroes in different factions with specific skills, who can make you a legend.
Forge magical gears, and outfit your warriors for victory!
With simple operation, easy to enjoy the fun of the game!

3. Addictive Contents & Features (Fantasy Adventure with Titans)
Fight from Magic Tower to Airship, further from Arena to Alliance war.
New features and contents which are constantly updated waiting for you to explore!

4. GUILD Wars (Ultimate fight & Rush)
Having more fun by founding a strong guild with other players around the world!
Compete with other Guilds across servers to win Global Awards.

5. Worldwide Arena (No.1 PVP)
Show everyone your best AFK squad by defeating all other players in the Arena.
Climb the Leader board for the best rewards!
